AttributeType.name: CLASS
AttributeType.description: The CLASS attribute is used to suggest to the renderer that it use a specific control.

AttributeType.name: ORIENTATION
AttributeType.description: Causes the control to be vertical or horizontal rather than horizontal.

AttributeType.name: MENUID
AttributeType.description: Win32 Specific : the ID of the Menu resource associated to this PAGE. The MENU is a classic Win32 Menu and needs to be in your resources.

AttributeType.name: MAP
AttributeType.description: Maps the units used for the controls to the grid system specified. e.g. if the grid is 3 by 2, then a location of (1,1) is mapped to (3,2).

AttributeType.name: WIDER
AttributeType.description: When using automatic or directed RESIZE capabilities on the dialog, the horizontal resize nature of the individual controls can be altered using this attribute.

AttributeType.name: TALLER
AttributeType.description: When using automatic or directed RESIZE capabilities on the dialog, the vertical resize nature of the individual controls can be altered using this attribute.

AttributeType.name: ALIGN
AttributeType.dt:values: LEFT RIGHT TOP BOTTOM VERTICAL HORIZONTAL
AttributeType.description: Align the controls. The actual behavior of the align command will depend on what control you are using.

AttributeType.name: TITLE
AttributeType.description:
The caption that will be displayed if the page has a caption bar.
If the page is part of a property sheet or wizard the TITLE will be used as the label for that page.

AttributeType.name: FONTSIZE
AttributeType.description:
The fontsize used for the dialog.
The STYLE element should be used in preference.

AttributeType.name: FONT
AttributeType.description:
The font used for the dialog.
the STYLE element should be used in preference.

AttributeType.name: RESIZE
AttributeType.description:
Allows dialog to automatically resize.
Dialogs can be made to resize automatically. Setting RESIZE to AUTOMATIC invokes a limited set of pre-defined rules about which controls can resize and in which directions. If you determine that these heuristics do not work for a particular control, use the RELATIVE element to specify the control's characteristics. Setting RESIZE to DIRECTED turns off the AUTOMATIC rules and relies solely upon the information provided in the RELATIVE elements.

AttributeType.name: CLIPPING
AttributeType.description:
Indicates that the runtime should prevent clipped text.
Setting CLIPPING to ALLOW means that clipped text is OK on this dialog.
Setting CLIPPING to PREVENT means that the runtime will attempt to re-size controls to prevent clipped text.
Setting CLIPPING to DIRECTECT means that clipping is defined on a per control basis.

AttributeType.name: BALLOON
AttributeType.description: This text is displayed as the BALLOON tip.

AttributeType.name: TOOLTIP
AttributeType.description: This is the tooltip text.

AttributeType.name: CONTEXTHELP
AttributeType.description: This is the help that is displayed when the user requests context help.

AttributeType.name: FONT-FAMILY
AttributeType.description: Used to declare a specific font to be used.

AttributeType.name: FONT-SIZE
AttributeType.description:
The size of the font.
For Microsoft Active Accessibility, this should only be set to 'larger' or 'smaller'. Absolute values should not be used.

AttributeType.name: FONT-STYLE
AttributeType.description:
The way the font looks
The 'font-style' property requests normal (sometimes referred to as "roman" or "upright"), italic, and oblique faces within a font family. Values are

AttributeType.name: FONT-WEIGHT
AttributeType.description:
'Thickness' of the strokes.
The font weight refers to the boldness or lightness of the glyphs used to render the text, relative to other fonts in the same font family.

AttributeType.name: COLOR
AttributeType.description:
The foreground color of a controls text content.
All the HTML colors are supported, e.g. red, lightgoldenrodyellow.

AttributeType.name: BACKGROUND-COLOR
AttributeType.description:
The background color of a controls text content.
All the HTML colors are supported, e.g. red, lightgoldenrodyellow.

AttributeType.name: BORDER-STYLE
AttributeType.dt:values: none dotted dashed solid double groove ridge inset outset flat narrow sunken topbottometched rightleftetched etched tabs flatseparators thin thick 3D raised
AttributeType.description: Sets the style of the four borders.

AttributeType.name: BORDER-WIDTH
AttributeType.description: Sets the width of the four borders

AttributeType.name: BORDER-COLOR
AttributeType.description: Sets the color of the four borders.

AttributeType.name: TEXT-ALIGN
AttributeType.dt:values: justify left right center top bottom
AttributeType.description:
This describes how the text should be aligned in the control.
Expalin the defaults REVIEW.

AttributeType.name: TEXT-TRANSFORM
AttributeType.description:
This controls the capitalization effects of an element's text.
Explain the values, REVIEW.

AttributeType.name: MULTILINE
AttributeType.description:
This controls whether or not a control is allowed to be multiline.
Essentially wraps the text to multiple lines if the text string is too long to fit on a single line.

AttributeType.name: DISPLAY
AttributeType.description: Indicates if this control should be 'laid out'.

AttributeType.name: VISIBLE
AttributeType.description: Indicates if this control should be visible once laid out.

AttributeType.name: DISABLED
AttributeType.description: Indicates if this control should be disabled or not.

AttributeType.name: X
AttributeType.description: X location.

AttributeType.name: Y
AttributeType.description: Y location.

AttributeType.name: WIDTH
AttributeType.description: Width of the control.

AttributeType.name: HEIGHT
AttributeType.description: HEIGHT of the control.

AttributeType.name: ID
AttributeType.description: The ID for the control. Does not have to be unique.

AttributeType.name: RELATIVE
AttributeType.description:
Indicates if the location of this control is relative to another. Relative="YES" or Relative=<id>
YES means that this control is relative to the preceeding control. <id> indicates the ID of the relative control. Some controls, e.g. LABELs, do not need ID's, so RELATIVE="YES" is used. When a control is relative, it inherits the following attributes from the source control. WIDTH HEIGHT X and Y.

AttributeType.name: FILL
AttributeType.description: Used to control the way the control sizes, when the form resizes.

AttributeType.name: CLIPPED
AttributeType.description:
Used to control the way the control is clipped.
VERTICAL allows the control to be clipped vertically (i.e. will be made wider)
BOTH allows the control to be clipped in both directions (i.e. the control will NOT be resized)
NEITHER control should be sized to PREVENT clipping (i.e. expanded)
HORIZONTAL control will not be resized horizontally (i.e. will be made taller)

AttributeType.name: TEXT
AttributeType.description: The text that will be displayed by the parent element.

AttributeType.name: CONTENT
AttributeType.description:
Indicates the type of content to be displayed in this edit control.
NUMBER causes only numeric data to be entered. FILE causes the edit control to assist in entering filenames. PASSWORD cases the eidt control to 'hide' the typed in text.

AttributeType.name: EXTENSIBLE
AttributeType.description:
Indicates that the content of the control can be extended by the user.
Used primerily in things like MRU lists, where the text the user types in is appended to the control.

AttributeType.name: MIN
AttributeType.description: The minimum value in the range.

AttributeType.name: MAX
AttributeType.description: The maximum value in the range.

AttributeType.name: VALUE
AttributeType.description: The current value.

AttributeType.name: UNIT
AttributeType.description: Specifies the type of UNIT used in the definition of the page. PX denotes a pixel based layout.

AttributeType.name: ANNOTATE
AttributeType.description: Detemines whether the grid lines used to work out automatic resizing will be drawn on the page. Blue lines denote static rows/columns and green lines denote stretchable rows/columns.

AttributeType.name: TIMER
AttributeType.description: By default, the control creates a thread to play the AVI clip. If you set this flag, the control plays the clip without creating a thread; internally the control uses a Win32 timer to synchronize playback. Style Bit: ACS_TIMER

AttributeType.name: READONLY
AttributeType.description: Used to prevent the user from modifying the content of the control.

AttributeType.name: MAXLENGTH
AttributeType.description: Used to limit the amount of data the user can enter.

ElementType.name: RCML
ElementType.description: This is the parent node of all RCML files.

ElementType.name: ITEM
ElementType.description: This elements contains a piece of text, and an associated value.

AttributeType.name: SELECTED
AttributeType.description: Indicates that this item should show in the selected state, where applicable.

AttributeType.name: CHECKED
AttributeType.description: Indicates that this item should show in the checked state, where applicable.

ElementType.name: BUTTON
ElementType.description: A push button.

ElementType.name: CHECKBOX
ElementType.description: A check button.

AttributeType.name: TRISTATE
AttributeType.description:
Checkbox can have three states.
The states are checked, unchecked, an indeterminant. Generally there are three distinct renderings.

ElementType.name: RADIOBUTTON
ElementType.description: A radio button.

ElementType.name: EDIT
ElementType.description: An edit control.

ElementType.name: GROUPBOX
ElementType.description: A GroupBox control.

ElementType.name: COMBOBOX
ElementType.description: A combobox (COMBO) control.

AttributeType.name: SIZE
AttributeType.description: Number of items the use can see at any time

AttributeType.name: SORT
AttributeType.description: Sorts the item in the list.

ElementType.name: LISTBOX
ElementType.description: A listbox control.

AttributeType.name: SORT
AttributeType.description: Sorts the item in the list.

AttributeType.name: SELECTION
AttributeType.description:
Determins the type of selections the user can make.
NO means the user cannot select an item. EXTENDED means the user can select many disparate items. SIMPLE a simple selection model.

AttributeType.name: MULTIPLE
AttributeType.description: Allows the user to select more than one item from the list

AttributeType.name: MULTICOLUMN
AttributeType.description: The list should be shown in multiple columns.

ElementType.name: LABEL
ElementType.description: A Static / Label control.

AttributeType.name: ELLIPSIS
AttributeType.description:
Specifies how the text is to be truncated
END ellipsis are added to the end of text
PATH ellipsis are added to the middle of the text, assuming the text is a pathname.
WORD (NT documentation is vague on this).

ElementType.name: IMAGE
ElementType.description: A control capable of displaying an image or render a movie.

AttributeType.name: ALIGN
AttributeType.description: Centers the animation.

AttributeType.name: TRANSPARENT
AttributeType.description: Makes the animation background transparent.

AttributeType.name: CONTENT
AttributeType.dt:values: ANIMATION ICON PICTURE MOVIE BITMAP VECTOR
AttributeType.description:
Specifies the media content.
ANIMATION will use comctl32 anuimation control to play an AVI with no sound. ICON will use a icon from the IMAGEID. BITMAP will use a bitmap from IMAGEID. VECTOR will use a vector from the IMAGEID. PICTURE will use GDI+ to render the image file. The supported formats now are JPG, GIF, BMP, WMF. Check the documentation for the version of gdi+ you are using to find out information on other supported formats. MOVIE will use DirectShow through the MCI control to render movies with sound. Check the documentation for the version of the MCI control to find out information on other supported formats.

AttributeType.name: FILE
AttributeType.description: Specifies the file path or URL of the image that will be loaded.

AttributeType.name: IMAGEID
AttributeType.description: Specifies the intermal image reference to be used.

ElementType.name: RECT
ElementType.description: Rectangle or box.

ElementType.name: RANGE
ElementType.description: Use this element to specify a range for a control.

ElementType.name: CONTROL
ElementType.description: Control is the base element for specifying the type location size and style of windows controls. This is the base element for all higher level controls. If the control you are trying to use doesn't exist in this schema, certain renderers may be able to use the CONTROL element to describe it.

ElementType.name: SCROLLBAR
ElementType.description: A Scroll Bar.

AttributeType.name: ALIGN
AttributeType.description: Specifies how the scrollbar should appear in the rectangle.

ElementType.name: SPINNER
ElementType.description:
An Up/Down control. Generally associated with an edit field.
Allows the user to increment/ decrement the value in the edit control.

AttributeType.name: WRAP
AttributeType.description: Causes the position to wrap if it is incremented or decremented beyond the ending or beginning of the range.

AttributeType.name: CONTENT
AttributeType.description: Causes the spinner to place a number in the edit control.

AttributeType.name: ALIGN
AttributeType.description:
Positions the spin button control next to the right/left edge of the buddy window.
The width of the buddy window is decreased to accommodate the width of the control

AttributeType.name: BUDDY
AttributeType.description: Set to AUTO the spinner will automatically buddy up with the previous control.

AttributeType.name: ARROWKEYS
AttributeType.description: The arrow keys have the same affect as clicking on the up/down buttons.

AttributeType.name: NOTHOUSANDS
AttributeType.description: Does not insert a thousands separator between every three decimal digits.

AttributeType.name: HOTTRACK
AttributeType.description: Makes the control 'hottrack'.

ElementType.name: SLIDER
ElementType.description:
A Slider control.
A control with a thumb which slides from left/right or up/down.

AttributeType.name: AUTOTICKS
AttributeType.description: Creates a slider that has a tick mark for each increment in its range of values.

AttributeType.name: TICKS
AttributeType.dt:values: TOP LEFT BOTTOM RIGHT BOTH NONE
AttributeType.description:
Determins where the tickmarks are displayed, if any.
TOP = tick marks on the top of a horizontal slider. LEFT = tick marks on the left of a vertical slider. BOTTOM = tick marks on the bottom of a horizontal slider. RIGHT = tick marks on the right of a vertical slider. BOTH = tick marks on both sides of a slider. NONE = No tickmarks.

AttributeType.name: SELECTION
AttributeType.description: Slider can be used to define a selection.

AttributeType.name: NOTHUMB
AttributeType.description: To remove the thumb, set this to YES.

AttributeType.name: FIXEDLENGTH
AttributeType.description: Allows the lenght of the slider to change.

AttributeType.name: TOOLTIPS
AttributeType.description: Tooltips are automatically generated, and show the current slider position.

ElementType.name: PROGRESS
ElementType.description: A progressbar control.

AttributeType.name: SMOOTH
AttributeType.description: Renders the progress bar as a continuous block.

ElementType.name: COLUMN
ElementType.description: Used to define a column.

AttributeType.name: WIDTH
AttributeType.description:
Specifies the width of the column
CONTENT causes the column to be as wide as the items in it. FILL causes the LAST column to occupy all remaining space in the parent control.

AttributeType.name: ALIGNMENT
AttributeType.description:
Specifies the alignment of the itmes in the column
LEFT causes the column items to be left aligned. RIGTH causes the column items to be right aligned. CENTER causes the column items to be center aligned.

ElementType.name: LISTVIEW
ElementType.description: A listview control.

AttributeType.name: DISPLAY
AttributeType.description: Changes the way that the content is rendered.

AttributeType.name: SELECTION
AttributeType.description: Changes the way that the content is rendered.

AttributeType.name: SORT
AttributeType.description: Changes the way that the content sorted.

AttributeType.name: NOLABELWRAP
AttributeType.description: In ICON display, prevents the labels from wrapping.

AttributeType.name: AUTOARRANGE
AttributeType.description: Automatically arranges the content.

AttributeType.name: EDITLABELS
AttributeType.description: Allows the editing of the labels (first column).

AttributeType.name: NOSCROLL
AttributeType.description: Prevents the scrolling of the control.

AttributeType.name: ALIGN
AttributeType.description: Alignment of the content.

AttributeType.name: NOCOLUMNHEADER
AttributeType.description: Prevents column headers from being displayed in report/ list view.

AttributeType.name: NOSORTHEADER
AttributeType.description:
Column headers do not work like buttons.
This style can be used if clicking a column header in report view does not carry out an action, such as sorting.

AttributeType.name: CONTENT
AttributeType.description: Enables check boxes for items in a list view control.

ElementType.name: TREEVIEW
ElementType.description: A treeview control.

AttributeType.name: LINES
AttributeType.description: Lines are drawn between the nodes, and up to the ROOT.

AttributeType.name: EDITLABLES
AttributeType.description: Lables are editable.

AttributeType.name: NOTOOLTIPS
AttributeType.description: Prevents tooltips.

AttributeType.name: CHECKBOXES
AttributeType.description: Checkboxes.

AttributeType.name: AUTOEXPAND
AttributeType.description: Single click expands the items in the tree.

AttributeType.name: FULLROWSELECT
AttributeType.description: FULLROWSELECT.

AttributeType.name: NOSCROLL
AttributeType.description: NOSCROLL.

ElementType.name: TOOLTIP
ElementType.description: The tooltip to be displayed.

ElementType.name: BALLOON
ElementType.description: The balloon tip to be displayed.

ElementType.name: HELP
ElementType.description: This element contains all manner of additional help related to the control.

AttributeType.name: CONTEXTID
AttributeType.description: The HelpID context for the control.

ElementType.name: RELATIVE
ElementType.description:
Used to specify a relative location for a control.
It's highly recommended to use the ALIGN shorthand.

AttributeType.name: X
AttributeType.description:
X offset.
The horizontal different between the CORNER and RELATIVECORNER.

AttributeType.name: Y
AttributeType.description:
Y offset.
The vertical different between the CORNER and RELATIVECORNER.

AttributeType.name: WIDTH
AttributeType.description:
Width of the control.
INHERIT inherits the TO controls WIDTH.

AttributeType.name: HEIGHT
AttributeType.description:
Height of the control.
INHERIT inherits the TO controls WIDTH.

AttributeType.name: TO
AttributeType.description: Allows the control to be relative to the PREVIOUS control, the PAGE that it is in, or a particular control ID.

AttributeType.name: INSIDE
AttributeType.description: Is this control INSIDE another control. All controls relative to the PAGE are considered INSIDE the control. If you make a control relative to a GROUPBOX, and you want them INSIDE the groupbox, use this attribute.

AttributeType.name: ALIGN
AttributeType.dt:values: ABOVE BELOW LEFT RIGHT DROPLEFT DROPRIGHT TOPRIGHT TOPLEFT BOTTOMLEFT BOTTOMRIGHT
AttributeType.description: A shorhand for placing controls relative to each other, or the PAGE.

AttributeType.name: CORNER
AttributeType.dt:values: TOPLEFT TOPMIDDLE TOPRIGHT RIGHTMIDDLE BOTTOMRIGHT BOTTOMMIDDLE BOTTOMLEFT LEFTMIDDLE CENTER
AttributeType.description: Which corner of this control you are positioning.

AttributeType.name: RELATIVECORNER
AttributeType.dt:values: TOPLEFT TOPMIDDLE TOPRIGHT RIGHTMIDDLE BOTTOMRIGHT BOTTOMMIDDLE BOTTOMLEFT LEFTMIDDLE CENTER
AttributeType.description: Which corner on the TO control you want to be relative to.

ElementType.name: STRINGTABLE
ElementType.description: Contains a set of ITEMs to be assiciated with this page.

ElementType.name: CAPTION
ElementType.description: This element defines the caption bar of the form and how it should look.

AttributeType.name: TEXT
AttributeType.description:
The title of the form.
If this is a single page form this will over-ride the PAGE's TITLE attribute.

AttributeType.name: CLOSE
AttributeType.description:
The CLOSE box on the form.
If CLOSE is set to yes, the system menu is also displayed, if close is set to NO, there will be no system menu.

AttributeType.name: MAXIMIZEBOX
AttributeType.description: The MAXIMIZE box on the form

AttributeType.name: MINIMIZEBOX
AttributeType.description: The MINIMIZE box on the form

ElementType.name: FORM
ElementType.description: The FORM contains a set of PAGEs.

AttributeType.name: DISPLAY
AttributeType.description: How the FORMS should be displayed.

ElementType.name: PAGE
ElementType.description: This encapsulates all the controls, and layout information for a particular page on the form.

AttributeType.name: X
AttributeType.description: X location on the screen, if the form is 'top level'.

AttributeType.name: Y
AttributeType.description: Y location on the screen, if the form is 'top level'.

AttributeType.name: WIDTH
AttributeType.description: Width of the form. (Currently this is in dialog units).

AttributeType.name: HEIGHT
AttributeType.description: HEIGHT of the form. (Currently this is in dialog units);

AttributeType.name: ID
AttributeType.description: The ID for the form.

ElementType.name: PAGER
ElementType.description: Pager Contro. (common controls)

AttributeType.name: AUTOSCROLL
AttributeType.description: Causes the pager to automatically scroll.

AttributeType.name: FOCUS
AttributeType.description: Whether or not the tab control receives the input focus.

AttributeType.name: SHUFFLE
AttributeType.description: Shuffles.

AttributeType.name: ALIGN
AttributeType.description: Where the TABs appear in relation to the content.

AttributeType.name: MULTISELECT
AttributeType.description: Allows more than one tab to be selected at once.

AttributeType.name: STYLE
AttributeType.description: Rendering style.

AttributeType.name: JUSTIFY
AttributeType.description: Rendering style.

AttributeType.name: FIXEDWIDTH
AttributeType.description: All the tabs are to be the same width.

ElementType.name: HEADER
ElementType.description: This is the header control (common controls)

AttributeType.name: BUTTONS
AttributeType.description: Render as buttons..

AttributeType.name: FULLDRAG
AttributeType.description: Headers can be moved around.

ElementType.name: LAYOUT
ElementType.description: The children of this element dictate the layout to be used on the page.

ElementType.name: PLATFORM
ElementType.description: This node contains information about the authoring platform. This can be used by rendering engines to better display the content.

ElementType.name: XYLAYOUT
ElementType.description: This denotes the kind of layout used for the form. This layout is very similar to the 'Win32' dialog layout.

ElementType.name: STYLE
ElementType.description: The style element is similar to the style element in CSS. When used as a child of FORM, it is used as the default STYLE for all elements which support STYLE children. i.e. specifying COLOR and BACKGROUND color affect all controls on the form.

ElementType.name: GRID

AttributeType.name: DISPLAY
AttributeType.description: Shows the grid on the dialog itself. Useful for alignment, but only at design time.

AttributeType.name: X
AttributeType.description: Horizontal size of the grid.

AttributeType.name: Y
AttributeType.description: Vertical size of the grid.

ElementType.description: Specifies a 'layout' grid for the layout manager.
